typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulementwithIndex
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		ca_avoir as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		dd as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_avoir as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> avoirwithIndex
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> stgOffre
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> referentielATC
source(output(
		{Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		prix_unitaire_std as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixMoyen
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
RenameLeft derive(ca_final = toDouble(ca_ecoulement),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_ecc ),
		data_origin = "ecoulement",
		id_canal_final = 42) ~> caFinal
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = columnChoiceEcoulement@yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameLeft
fullLeft filter(isNull(renameAvoir@indexcols2)) ~> outerLeft
ecoulementwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoiceEcoulement
avoirwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameAvoir
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerAvoir
innerAvoir derive(canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP", 
    iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = renameAvoir@yearmonth,
		year = {Année},
		month = Mois) ~> canal
canal derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45, 
    iif(canal=="FS", 51, 
    iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		ca_final = toDouble(qte_avoir)*toDouble(ca_avoir),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_avoir)) ~> idCanal
idCanal derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", 'Diffus'),
		data_origin = "ecoulement retraité") ~> idCanalFinal
stgOffre select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre = Offre,
		{ATC Performance} = CodeATC,
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(NoOffre,
		{ATC Performance}),
	Canal = max(Canal)) ~> uniqueOffre
idCanalFinal, uniqueOffre join(renameAvoir@NoOffre == uniqueOffre@NoOffre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftOffre
dropColumns select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndInner
caFinal, EndInner union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", "Diffus")) ~> canalFinal
referentielATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc = {Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> atcKeepingColumn
DerivedColumn4 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> atcNotNull
atcNotNull aggregate(groupBy(code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		Marque),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> uniqueATC
facturation derive(qt_cd_e = toInteger(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		qt_livr_e = toInteger(qt_livr_e),
		qt_factur_e = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		ca_livr_ = toDouble(ca_livr_),
		ca_factur_ = toDouble(ca_factur_),
		tempDist = iif(lower(WholeSalerID)=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'dsc')>0, 'dsc',     iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort', 	iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',lower(WholeSalerID))))))) ~> typeCaste
fillNaPeriodeFact aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		HubSAPid,
		year,
		{Période}),
	qt_cd_e = sum(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = sum(ca_cd_),
		qt_livr_e = sum(qt_livr_e),
		ca_livr_ = sum(ca_livr_),
		qt_factur_e = sum(qt_factur_e),
		ca_factur_ = sum(ca_factur_),
		{Canal distribution} = first({Canal distribution}),
		{Org commerciale} = first({Org commerciale}),
		{recept de march} = first({recept de march})) ~> Aggregate2
fullLeftOffre select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2 = columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = renameAvoir@HubSAPid,
		ca_avoir,
		POSid,
		indexcols2 = renameAvoir@indexcols2,
		canal = canal@canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		data_origin,
		{ATC Performance},
		NoOffre = renameAvoir@NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
Aggregate2 derive(tempOrigin = "facturation",
		{Canal distribution} = 42) ~> DerivedColumn2
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAvoir
JoinAvoir filter(isNull(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2)) ~> FilterIndexCols2
FilterIndexCols2 select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = renameAvoir@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth = renameAvoir@yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2 = renameAvoir@indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnsChoice
uniqueATC filter(code_postal_atc==3300) ~> Filter8
atcKeepingColumn derive(code_postal_atc = toInteger(code_postal_atc)) ~> DerivedColumn4
prixMoyen derive({Période} = iif(length({Période})>1,{Période},"0"+{Période})) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoicePrix
canalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> prepareGetPeriode
typeCaste, columnChoicePrix join(replace(lower(tempDist), " ", "") == replace(lower(Distributeur), " ", "")
	&& toInteger(year) == toInteger(annee2)
	&& toInteger({Mois calendrier}) == toInteger(month)
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(columnChoicePrix@Article, " ", ""))),replace(columnChoicePrix@Article, " ", "")),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
join2 derive({Période} = coalesce( {Période}, "00" )) ~> fillNaPeriodeFact
prepareGetPeriode, columnChoicePrix join(replace(lower( iif(prepareGetPeriode@distributeur=="MABILLE", "sonac", prepareGetPeriode@distributeur) ), " ", "") == replace(lower(columnChoicePrix@Distributeur), " ", "")
	&& toInteger(year) == toInteger(annee2)
	&& toInteger(prepareGetPeriode@month) == toInteger(columnChoicePrix@month)
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", "")),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join3
join3 derive({Période} = coalesce( {Période}, "00" )) ~> derivedColumn200
derivedColumn200 derive(Indexcol2 = concat(lower(HubSAPid) , "-" , lower(year), "-" , lower({Période}), "-" , lower(reference))) ~> CreateIndexColEcoul
DerivedColumn2 derive(Indexcol2 = concat(lower(HubSAPid) , "-" , lower(year), "-" , lower({Période}), "-" , lower(reference))) ~> CreateIndexColFact
CreateIndexColEcoul, EndFact join(Indexcol2 == f_Indexcol2,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join4
select103 select(mapColumn(
		f_reference,
		f_HubSAPid,
		f_year,
		{f_Période},
		f_qt_cd_e,
		f_ca_cd_,
		f_qt_livr_e,
		f_ca_livr_,
		f_qt_factur_e,
		f_ca_factur_,
		{f_Canal distribution},
		{f_Org commerciale},
		{f_recept de march},
		f_tempOrigin,
		f_Indexcol2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndFact
join4 split(!isNull(data_origin) && !isNull(f_tempOrigin),
	!isNull(data_origin) && isNull(f_tempOrigin),
	disjoint: false) ~> split1@(EcoulementMatche, EcoulementNonMatch, FacturationSansMatching)
CreateIndexColFact split(isNull(reference),
	disjoint: false) ~> split2@(null, notNull)
CreateIndexColFact select(mapColumn(
		f_reference = reference,
		f_HubSAPid = HubSAPid,
		f_year = year,
		{f_Période} = {Période},
		f_qt_cd_e = qt_cd_e,
		f_ca_cd_ = ca_cd_,
		f_qt_livr_e = qt_livr_e,
		f_ca_livr_ = ca_livr_,
		f_qt_factur_e = qt_factur_e,
		f_ca_factur_ = ca_factur_,
		{f_Canal distribution} = {Canal distribution},
		{f_Org commerciale} = {Org commerciale},
		{f_recept de march} = {recept de march},
		f_tempOrigin = tempOrigin,
		f_Indexcol2 = Indexcol2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select103
split1@EcoulementNonMatch select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month = split1@EcoulementNonMatch@month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur = split1@EcoulementNonMatch@distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		Article,
		Distributeur = split1@EcoulementNonMatch@Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month = split1@EcoulementNonMatch@month,
		Indexcol2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select104
split1@FacturationSansMatching select(mapColumn(
		f_reference,
		f_HubSAPid,
		f_year,
		{f_Période},
		f_qt_cd_e,
		f_ca_cd_,
		f_qt_livr_e,
		f_ca_livr_,
		f_qt_factur_e,
		f_ca_factur_,
		{f_Canal distribution},
		{f_Org commerciale},
		{f_recept de march},
		f_tempOrigin,
		f_Indexcol2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select105
split1@EcoulementMatche split(data_origin == "ecoulement retraité",
	disjoint: false) ~> split3@(EcoulementRetraiteMatche, EcoulementMatch)
split3@EcoulementRetraiteMatche select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month = split3@EcoulementRetraiteMatche@month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur = split3@EcoulementRetraiteMatche@distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		Article,
		Distributeur = split3@EcoulementRetraiteMatche@Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month = split3@EcoulementRetraiteMatche@month,
		Indexcol2,
		f_reference,
		f_HubSAPid,
		f_year,
		{f_Période},
		f_qt_cd_e,
		f_ca_cd_,
		f_qt_livr_e,
		f_ca_livr_,
		f_qt_factur_e,
		f_ca_factur_,
		{f_Canal distribution},
		{f_Org commerciale},
		{f_recept de march},
		f_tempOrigin,
		f_Indexcol2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EcoulementRetraiteMatche
split3@EcoulementMatch select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month = split3@EcoulementMatch@month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur = split3@EcoulementMatch@distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		Article,
		Distributeur = split3@EcoulementMatch@Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month = split3@EcoulementMatch@month,
		Indexcol2,
		f_reference,
		f_HubSAPid,
		f_year,
		{f_Période},
		f_qt_cd_e,
		f_ca_cd_,
		f_qt_livr_e,
		f_ca_livr_,
		f_qt_factur_e,
		f_ca_factur_,
		{f_Canal distribution},
		{f_Org commerciale},
		{f_recept de march},
		f_tempOrigin,
		f_Indexcol2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EcoulementMatche
EcoulementRetraiteMatche derive(origine_de_la_ligne = "Ecoulement Retraité - Matché") ~> derivedColumn201
EcoulementMatche derive(origine_de_la_ligne = "Ecoulment Matché") ~> derivedColumn202
columnsChoice sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['avoirUnMapped.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> avoirUnMapped
